name: Batman and Harley Quinn Quiz | Animated Batman | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the opening scene a female villain was shown breaking into S.T.A.R. Labs with a partner. Who was it?
questions.explanation:
Poison Ivy.

	Batman and Nightwing responded to the break in and found that Ivy had stolen some information about Dr. Alec Holland and his restorative formula. He was turned into Swamp Thing. It was a similar villain, the Floronic Man, who had teamed up with her for the break in.

questions.text: Where did Nightwing find Harley Quinn?
questions.explanation:
Superbabes Diner.

	Superbabes was a diner where all of the waitresses dressed in skimpy versions of DC Comics female heroes. Harley was the only villain in the group, and the only one that was actually the hero/villain that she was dressed as.

questions.text: How did Harley beat Nightwing when they fought outside of her apartment?
questions.explanation:
Joker Venom.

	She had a spiked ring with low-grade Joker Venom in it. She said that was the only good thing she ever got from him.  After beating Nightwing she tied him up inside her apartment.

False.

	While arguing with Harley Quinn, Batman mentioned that she was his punishment for dropping out of medical school. He never mentioned a law degree at all. Harley ended up giving him directions to a small bar in Bludhaven as a place where Poison Ivy could be hiding.

questions.text: Who got gassy and stunk up the Batmobile?
questions.explanation:
Harley.

	She asked Batman to pull over because some chicken wings she had eaten were causing her some distress. He didn't stop so she let loose a fart in the car. Nightwing was bothered by it, but Batman said it "wasn't that bad" and that it "smelled like discipline".

questions.text: Who was running the Watchtower when Batman needed help?
questions.explanation:
Booster Gold.

	Booster was running the Watchtower, which had been started by Oracle (Barbara Gordon). At this point in the DC Universe, Barbara had regained her ability to walk and returned to the world as Batgirl. Booster told Batman that he couldn't sent any major heroes to help them because they were mostly trying to stop a comet and at Aquaman's house where there was no reception.

questions.text: What state did the swamp water needed to complete the villains' plan come from?
questions.explanation:
Louisiana.

	Dr. Holland's lab was in Louisiana. The swamp waters from the site of the accident that caused him to turn into Swamp Thing was needed to complete Poison Ivy and Floronic Man's plan to turn everyone on the planet into plant-like creatures.

questions.text: Harley was killed fighting Poison Ivy.
questions.explanation:
False.

	She went with the "nuclear" option in order to defeat Ivy. She took off her hood, wiped off her makeup and cried in front of Ivy. The tears brought Ivy to a realization that she couldn't risk killing the entire Earth. A small miscalculation in her formula could have killed the entire planet.

questions.text: Who ultimately stopped the Floronic Man from fulfilling his plan?
questions.explanation:
Harley.

	Swamp Thing rose out of the swamp and talked to Floronic Man telling him that he caused a right "in the green". Swamp thing declined to fight him as it wasn't his place to judge. He then returned to the Parliament of Trees.  When Swamp Thing left, Floronic Man started to continue with his plan. That's when Harley decided to use the weed killer on him and the movie faded to black.

questions.text: What career did Harley have after helping stop Floronic Man?
questions.explanation:
TV host.

	She called herself a regular Dr. Quinn Medicine Woman. On her talk show she was a TV therapist, but refused to give away advice, instead she had an obstacle course and guests could win a year's worth of therapy.  This scene was shown during the credits.
